name: And They Were Roommates
description:
A game about a guy and his roommate.

This demo is my first game and I made with TyranoBuilder learning as I went and since it was made in 4 days, it might be a bit buggy but it runs.

This demo features:

  • 2 Endings
  • Animated Live2d Sprites! (very cool, very pain to make)
  • A very short game and simple game
